title.rendered: How do I look up a UPC code?

content.rendered:
There is no central database for the hundreds of millions of codes that exist.  Each vendor registers the UPC to the product information in their database. However, there are large databases that include a fair amount of information about codes.  Many codes may return no result even though they are active since the database hasn’t crawled it, or the owner hasn’t yet registered the UPC code.  Below are a list of places to look up UPC codes:

  • Barcode Report
  • Barcode Lookup
  • GS1 Prefix Lookup
  • UPCitemdb.com

There are many other databases.  If you type the UPC number into Google or into Amazon you can also find more results.  Note: if the code doesn’t return any result, it doesn’t necessarily mean it is invalid, it may simply mean it hasn’t been registered yet.
